data.title: Greenberg Traurig LLP
data.meta_description: Greenberg Traurig’s Warsaw office offers a broad range of capabilities, advising on Poland’s most significant transactions and disputes. With more than 25 years of experience across a variety of industry sectors, we are regularly recognized as a leading law firm in the country. Read more here.
data.text:
Greenberg Traurig’s Warsaw office offers a broad range of capabilities. Our unquestionable strength and advantage over other law firms in Poland derives from over 30 years of experience in advising on the largest and most significant transactions and disputes in the country.

Our Polish practice provides legal services in mergers and acquisitions, capital markets, real estate, private equity, banking and finance, bankruptcy proceedings and financial restructurings, asset securitization, competition and antitrust, tax structuring, labor law and management contracts, energy and natural resources, infrastructure and government contracts, intellectual property and TMT, environmental protection, and ESG, as well as litigation, arbitration, and white-collar crime.

We have experience across a wide range of industry sectors, including banking and finance, energy, mining, real estate, medical and healthcare, TMT, construction, and FMCG. Our clients include leading Polish and multinational financial institutions and companies.

Our Warsaw office is regularly recognised as a leading law firm in Poland, including being named “Law Firm of the Year 2021 in Poland” and “Most Innovative Law Firm of the Year 2019 and 2018 in Poland” by the International Financial Law Review (IFLR), “Law Firm of the Year 2017 in Poland” by Chambers and Partners, and “Law Firm of the Year for Client Service in Poland” by Chambers Europe in 2016.

Chambers Global, Chambers Europe, IFLR1000, and EMEA Legal 500 consistently rank our Warsaw office in the top tiers in the areas of Corporate/M&A, Capital Markets, Real Estate, Private Equity, Competition/Antitrust, Tax, Employment, Banking and Finance, Restructuring and Insolvency, Dispute Resolution, and TMT.

Local Capabilities

For more information on our local capabilities, visit the links below:

Contact Us

For more information about our Warsaw office, please feel free send us an e-mail at wawoffice@gtlaw.com or reach out to our Warsaw office contacts.

We are committed to the community where we live and work, providing pro bono legal assistance to numerous local and national initiatives. We actively support numerous organizations committed to the success of female lawyers.

The Greenberg Traurig Women’s Initiative (GTWI) reflects these principles and supports the inclusion and advancement of women in the legal profession through a unique program and resources designed to benefit the firm’s attorneys, clients, and future lawyers. GTWI has been successful in fostering the success of women attorneys, strengthening the firm’s culture, contributing to the firm’s financial health, and better serving firm clients.

Greenberg Traurig’s Warsaw office regularly collaborates with like-minded organizations, such as the Women in Law Foundation, ULI (mentoring program), and the Top Woman in Real Estate, to address these issues on a broader scale in a variety of industries and communities.
